Do all birds lay eggs?

options.label: A
options.optionText: Yes, there is no species known not to lay eggs.

options.label: B
options.optionText: Generally all birds lay eggs, but there are a few exceptions.

options.label: C
options.optionText: No, only about 80% of them do.
